com.communote.server.core.user

Class SecurityCodeManagementBase

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.communote.server.core.user.SecurityCodeManagementBase
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    SecurityCodeManagement
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    SecurityCodeManagementImpl

    @Transactional(propagation=REQUIRED)
public abstract class SecurityCodeManagementBase
extends Object
implements SecurityCodeManagement

    Spring Service base class for SecurityCodeManagement, provides access to all services and entities referenced by this service.

    Author:
    Communote GmbH - http://www.communote.com/
